question: I have had anxiety and panic disordes since the 1960s.I want to know if this cound be related  to my heart disease,anemia ,thyroid,diabetes. I have had a three way by-passand had to have a pacemaker three years ago. When I was in the service in the 60s I had a very traumic experience,thats when the anxiety ,the panic attacks started. I take medications for treatment. But I still have a lot of anxiety and panic attacks.
title: anxiety+side effects
